data.name: Ronan the Accuser
data.description: A Kree fanatic who summons Kree minions while denying the abilities of his foes with brutal strikes.

starItems.name: Ronan the Accuser
starItems.description: A Kree fanatic who summons Kree minions while denying the abilities of his foes with brutal strikes.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target

2.description:
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

4.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

5.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description: Summon 1 KREE ally at 100% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from 1 random ally. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble

2.description: Summon 1 KREE ally at 140% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from 1 random ally. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally Damage
Summon <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from <color=#86e619>3</color> allies

3.description: Summon 1-2 KREE allies at 180% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from 3 random allies. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble

4.description: Summon 1-2 KREE allies at 220% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from 3 random allies. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble

5.description: Summon 1-2 KREE allies at 260% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from 3 random allies. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> Damage
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from all allies

6.description: Summon 1-2 KREE allies at 300% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from all allies. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble

7.description: Summon 2 KREE allies at 340% normal Damage and 100% of normal Health. Clear 2 negative effects from all allies. Possible Summons: > Kree Reaper > Kree Noble

1.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional enemy.

2.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional enemy.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies

3.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies.

4.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies

5.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies.

7.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional enemies.

1.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally gains energy, they fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> and are healed for <color=#86e619>300</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's max Health. This effect may be triggered by another passive.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist. Apply +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist to <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies.

2.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally gains energy, they fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> and are healed for <color=#86e619>900</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's max Health. This effect may be triggered by another passive.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist. Apply +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist to <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>800</color> Healing
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health and <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies

3.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally gains energy, they fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> and are healed for <color=#86e619>1,700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's max Health. This effect may be triggered by another passive.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist. Apply +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist to <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies.

4.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally gains energy, they fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> and are healed for <color=#86e619>2,800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's max Health. This effect may be triggered by another passive.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist. Apply +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resist to <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies.

5.description:
Whenever this character or a <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally gains energy, they fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> and are healed for <color=#86e619>4,200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's max Health. This effect may be triggered by another passive.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resist. Apply +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resist to <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage to non-summoned <color=#fff568>KREE</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies.
